triples.name: Ggplot2
triples.relevance: ggplot2 is the visualization package that ggstatsplot extends with statistical analysis capabilities.

triples.name: R (programming language)
triples.relevance: R is the programming language in which the ggstatsplot package is implemented.

triples.name: Data visualization
triples.relevance: Data visualization is the core task that ggstatsplot addresses by embedding statistical details into graphical displays.

triples.name: Statistics
triples.relevance: Statistical analysis is integrated into the visualizations produced by ggstatsplot to enhance model evaluation.

triples.name: Data exploration
triples.relevance: Data exploration is a key workflow supported by ggstatsplot for researchers to understand data and validate models.

triples.name: Statistical graphics
triples.relevance: ggstatsplot proposes a systematic approach to creating statistical graphics by embedding statistical test results directly into ggplot2 visualizations.
